page.title: 15MY HOUSE IN SHREWTON
page.content: I live at No. 3 London Road, Shrewton. Our house is a Council House, which has just been modernised with a new bathroom and central heating too. We have three bedrooms and two toilets, but it is not really big enough for our family of six. I am the eldest boy and I have two younger brothers and a baby sister. My brothers share my bedroom with me and my sister has a room to herself. Our garden is a fairly large one, with a young plum tree and an old apple tree. At the top of the garden we grow rhubarb, and at the front my Mum grows flowers. We have a swing to play on.
